Subject: Hardening on the application VMs
Description:
Hi Team, 

We are ongoing audit as of now, they have requested us to provide application hardening provided by vendor. Can you help me to provide this, not the OS hardening but application hardening. Please check and let us know asap as this is very urgent request. Thank you.
What_We_Know__c: The customer has an ongoing audit, and they want to know if there is any "application hardening" done to NEA. They have been informed about the RBAC and SSL secure process.
Next_Steps__c: Customer is not responding back. Closing ticket now
Solution_Comment__c: The customer has an ongoing audit, and they want to know if there is any "application hardening" done to NEA. They have been informed about the RBAC and SSL secure process.
